page.title: 18Home Life-Washing cont.
page.content: between the ages where boys and girls begin to use 'extras' such as deoderant sprays and talcs to improve their appearances. Twelve year old girls were aware of therange of sprays available and were quick to experiment with them: bos were totally unconcerned at the same age, regarding these 'extras' as a waste of money and as a failure on the part of the girls! It is suggested that girls are exposed to a great deal of advertising through the magazines they read which encourages them to buy such cosmetics. Boys regard it as 'wet' or effeminate to use these materials-something which lasts into adulthood in some areas, where the use of deoderants, etc, is still regarded as unmanly!
